alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 22 at 6:14AM MST until March 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Period of snow, becoming more showery this afternoon. Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph, gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Additional snow forecast from 6 AM Today to noon Today: Jacob Lake 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
